snippet: Ohio State needed a victory in the Big Ten title game to keep pace with Florida State and Auburn. Instead, Michigan State handed the Buckeyes their first loss under Urban Meyer.
abstract: Michigan State defeats Ohio State, 34-24, squashing OSU's shot at playing in college football's BCS title game.
lead_paragraph: Ohio State needed a victory in the Big Ten title game to keep pace with Florida State and Auburn. Instead, Michigan State handed the Buckeyes their first loss under Urban Meyer.

headline.main: Spartans Squash Buckeyes and Debate Over B.C.S. Title Game
headline.print_headline: Spartans Squash Buckeyes and Debate Over Title Game
